analysis.description:
BitLoanex.buyTokens (/unique_contracts/0x925ab290d36cbd9761535faa95a623612721ff17.sol#190-215) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-totalSupply.sub(tokens) (/unique_contracts/0x925ab290d36cbd9761535faa95a623612721ff17.sol#206-208)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0x925ab290d36cbd9761535faa95a623612721ff17.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.15 (/unique_contracts/0x925ab290d36cbd9761535faa95a623612721ff17.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_to' of BitLoanex.transfer (/unique_contracts/0x925ab290d36cbd9761535faa95a623612721ff17.sol#96) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_value' of BitLoanex.transfer (/unique_contracts/0x925ab290d36cbd9761535faa95a623612721ff17.sol#96) is not in mixedCase
